Class PointCloud_3

  • java.lang.Object
    • Jcg.geometry.PointCloud<Point_3>

  • public class PointCloud_3
extends PointCloud<Point_3>
    Class representing a collection of points (in 3D)
    Version:
    jan 2014
    Author:
    Luca Castelli Aleardi, Ecole Polytechnique (INF562)
